mapper.select: select response_info.*, second_response_info.response_id as second_id,second_response_info.user_id as second_user, second_response_info.info_id as second_info_id,second_response_info.response_info as second_response_info, second_response_info.response_date as second_response_date,second_response_info.alter_user as second_alter_user, second_response_info.status as second_status,second_response_info.parent_id as parent_id from response_info left join second_response_info on (response_info.response_id = second_response_info.parent_id and second_response_info.status = 1 and second_response_info.info_id = #{infoId}) where response_info.status = 1 and response_info.info_id = #{infoId} order by response_info.response_date,second_response_info.response_date
